pkgmetadata.longdescription: Insert and Extract "Reminders" from Function Comments // Insert/extract text "reminders" into/from function source code comments or as the "comment" attribute of any object. The former can be handy in development as reminders of e.g. argument requirements, expected objects in the calling environment, required options settings, etc. The latter can be used to provide information of the object and as simple manual "tooltips" for users, among other things.
